moves.name: After You
moves.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

moves.name: Disarming Voice
moves.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

moves.name: After You
moves.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
